content: I understand that ITS is doing ballot resolution on this right now. I can't find how to connect. No one is on the HL7 # or the FreeConferenceCalls URL I was able to find for ITS. Anyone have the connection info?
Apologies for the confusion on the time, the call is on now (the regularly scheduled slot for ITS):
Actually, due to technical difficulties, we are here now: https://join.me/679-604-280
And due to further technical difficulties, we are here now: https://join.me/paulknapp
